ch0053_00_zakuro/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been looking forward to seeing you again.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0101_0701_02_10:
If there are walls we have to climb
today, let’s climb them together!
ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_01_10:
My Amaura is always on his best
behavior, and his skin feels so
nice and cool to the touch.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_02_10:
When I look at his long neck, I feel
a sense of friendship and closeness.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_03_10: I feel like he’s just as eager as I am.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0702_01_10:
I wonder what sort of things Amaura can
utilize his long neck for. Other than
eating food in high places, that is.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0702_02_10:
I’d love to sit down with him and leisurely
debate all of the many possibilities.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_01_10:
One time, a chunk of the cliff collapsed
where I was rock-climbing.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_02_10:
I actually found a fossil among
the stones that fell...
ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_03_10:
and it turned into a Tyrunt when
I had it restored at the Fossil Lab.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_04_10:
Funnily enough, I found my Amaura’s
fossil at those very same cliffs.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0702_01_10:
I wonder how I happened to find my
selfish Tyrunt in the same place I found
my sweet Amaura...
ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0702_02_10:
Maybe our friendship goes above and
beyond the walls of our differences.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_01_10:
I get along really well with Siebold,
one of the Elite Four of Kalos, where
we’re from.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_02_10:
He and I are a lot alike in that we’re
both completely devoted to bettering
ourselves and what we do.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_03_10:
I’m sure he’s on a deep dive into
Pasio cuisine right now, honing his
skills as a chef.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0702_01_10:
All this talk about Siebold is making me
miss his delicious cooking.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0702_02_10:
I’ll have to ask him to whip me up
something tasty the next time I see him.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_01_10:
This might surprise you, but I have
a little bit of a sweet tooth.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_02_10:
I’m trying to maintain my current body
weight, though, so I can’t have
too many sweets.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_03_10:
I limit myself to one slice of cake
each week, but sometimes it’s so
hard to resist.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_04_10:
Then again, that one slice of cake
tastes even more sublime after a whole
week of not eating any.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0702_01_10:
Strictly refraining from doing something
for a while makes me even more excited
to do that thing.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0702_02_10:
I continue to be strict with myself
so that I can savor that feeling!
ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_01_10:
These stones I use to decorate my
hair are all the rage back in Kalos.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_02_10:
I’m the one who started the
fashion trend, actually...
ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_03_10:
Incidentally, that’s how I earned my title as a 
trendsetter and fashion leader in Kalos.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_04_10:
I can be your fashion advisor if you
like, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0702_01_10:
These hair stones are unique in the
same way that we’re all unique
as people.
ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0702_02_10:
When your clothes and accessories are a
perfect match for your unique personality—
that’s TRUE fashion!
ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0701_01_10:
I found something nice for you
up in the mountains. Here!
ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0702_01_10:
You can find a lot of interesting
things up in the mountains if you
know how to look for them.
ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0702_02_10:
That’s one of the things I love
most about rock-climbing.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_01_10:
Having a daring, adventurous spirit
is most important of all.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_02_10:
When it comes to sports, there’s no
question. But challenging yourself when
it comes to food is also important!
ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_03_10:
I wonder what sort of flavors Pasio
has to offer us...
ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_04_10:
Now THAT’S an adventure I’d dare to
get behind!
ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_01_10:
Competing in the PML is an incredible
challenge—a mountain unlike any other
I’ve climbed before.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_02_10:
I wonder what it’ll look like at the
summit, towering over all the other
Trainers. I’d love to see for myself.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_03_10:
That is, after I’ve climbed over my
FIRST wall—defeating you, my friend.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_01_10:
You and your Pokémon seem like you
have a really close relationship
with each other.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_02_10:
Relationships with Pokémon can change
just like relationships with people, though,
depending on how dedicated you are.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_03_10:
But with someone as dedicated as you,
I’m sure there’ll never be any issues.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_01_10:
There are some things you just can’t reach,
no matter how far you stretch out your hand.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_02_10:
But you never give up—you keep on
fighting with everything in your heart.
ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_03_10:
I feel lucky to have found friends that are as 
talented and spirited as you and your Pokémon.
ch0053_00_zakuro/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
Are you ready for some early training?
ch0053_00_zakuro/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
It’s great weather for rock-climbing today.
ch0053_00_zakuro/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi there! How’s your training coming?
Make sure you’re thoroughly prepared to climb!
ch0053_00_zakuro/3004_0701_01_10:
Hi! Let’s put on a smile and give it
our best shot out there today.
ch0053_00_zakuro/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s getting pretty late, isn’t it.
I admire you for training hard into the night.
ch0053_00_zakuro/3006_0701_01_10:
You’re certainly working hard tonight!
Just be careful not to overdo it.
